Automatically clear out messages older t: Automatically clear out messages that have been in Trash or Spam for over 30 days. Enjoy this and other benefits when you upgrade.

Accounts with custom domains cannot join: Accounts with custom domains cannot join a Visionary or family plan.

Turn off to only search by date, name, e: Turn off this option to search only by date, name, e-mail address or message subject. To disable search in message content (and delete messages that have been downloaded to enable this feature), go to Settings.
Upgrade to automatically delete messages: Upgrade to automatically delete messages that have been in Trash or Spam for more than 30 days.
